alert.note: Alert for Box Butte; Dawes; North Sioux; South Sioux (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Blizzard Warning issued December 14 at 8:41PM CST until December 15 at 6:00PM CST by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...BLIZZARD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 PM MST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Blizzard condition in falling and blowing snow. Additional snow accumulations of up to 2 inches. Winds gusting as high as 55 MPH. * WHERE...Northern portions of the Nebraska Panhandle. * WHEN...Until 5 PM MST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Widespread blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. Strong winds could cause tree damage.
info.instruction: Travel should be restricted to emergencies only. If you must travel, have a winter survival kit with you. If you get stranded, stay with your vehicle. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Box Butte; Dawes; North Sioux; South Sioux
